name: Mahu
description:
Hey Hey, Avelnoguer here, I am testing some basic movement for my game, I hope a can get some feedback in this really early stage of development

As always basic control Scheme:

  • WASD -> For movement
  • Space Bar -> Jump
  • Hold A or D facing a wall to slide, the press space to Wall Jump
    ESC key -> Pause Menu

Try to catch all the mana drops in the stage, I want to know how do you feel the movement of the character and how hard was to accomplish the task :)
